short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Relevvo extension helps efficiently personalize messaging to engage the highest value prospects and accelerate your pipeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Relevvo Quickview allows Relevvo clients to quickly access relevant contextual information about their accounts and contacts.
